text: I have an income of $100,000 every month because I work extremely hard and am very focused on my goals and aspirations.
I feel very strong powerful and extremely healthy in body mind and soul.

I COMMAND MY SUBCONSCIOUS MIND TO ALIGN EVERY THOUGHT EVERY ACTION AND EVERY OUNCE OF MY BEING TO MAKE ME STRONGER HEALTHIER WEALTHIER AND WISER THEN EVER BOFORE, TRANSFORMING ME INTO A RELENTLESS MONEY MAKING MACHINE AS QUICKLY AND AS EFFICIENTLY AS POSSIBLE.
